charges.charge_description: CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS - did knowingly and intentionally conspire and agree together to distribute a mixture or substance containing a detectable amount of methamphetamine, a Schedule II controlled substance(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant to be imprisoned for a term of 120 months; Supervised release for 8 years; Defendant to pay a special assessment of $100.00

charges.charge_description: CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS - did knowingly and intentionally conspire and agree together to distribute a mixture or substance containing a detectable amount of methamphetamine, a Schedule II controlled substance(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 72 months imprisonment; court authorizes credit for time served only for his time in federal custody. It is hereby recommended to the Bureau of Prisons that the defendant be enrolled in the 500 hour substance abuse program; 4 years supervised release; $100.00 special assessment

charges.charge_description: CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS - did knowingly and intentionally conspire and agree together to distribute a mixture or substance containing a detectable amount of methamphetamine, a Schedule II controlled substance(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant to be imprisoned for 84 months; 4 years supervised release; $100.00 special assessment

charges.charge_description: NARCOTICS - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE - knowingly and intentionally possessed with intent to distribute a mixture or substance containing a detectable amount of methamphetamine, a Schedule II controlled substance(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed on motion of the Government during sentencing proceedings held 9/26/07

charges.charge_description: CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS - did knowingly and intentionally conspire and agree together to distribute a mixture or substance containing a detectable amount of methamphetamine, a Schedule II controlled substance(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 40 months imprisonment; defendant to self surrender for service of sentenced on 3/17/08 before 2pm; court recommends that the defendant be enrolled in the 500 hour substance abuse program; 4 years supervised release; $100.00 special assessment

charges.charge_description: CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS - did knowingly and intentionally conspire and agree together to distribute a mixture or substance containing a detectable amount of methamphetamine, a Schedule II controlled substance(1)

charges.charge_disposition: ORIGINAL SENTENCE: Defendant sentenced to 60 months imprisonment; court recommends that defendant be enrolled in the 500 hour substance abuse program; 4 years supervised release; $100.00 special assessment. JUDGMENT ON REVOCATION FILED 10/13/2011: Defendant sentenced to 12 months and 1 day imprisonment; 2 years supervised release. JUDGMENT ON REVOCATION FILED 2/28/2014: Supervised release revoked. Defendant committed for a term of six (6) months; no additional term of Supervised release ordered
